nodes.text: Dya-Tamm was a female Twi'lek who lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. During the war she lived on the capital planet of the Republic, Coruscant where she worked in the Equipment Requisitions area of the Senate Commercial District as a vendor of various goods.

Badna first appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a security key vendor, accessible only to players who purchased security keys for the game. She is only accessible to Republic players in the game as she is found on Coruscant which is a Republic only planet.
